com.facebook.buck.core.build.distributed.synchronization.impl

Class RemoteBuildRuleSynchronizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.core.build.distributed.synchronization.impl.RemoteBuildRuleSynchronizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RemoteBuildRuleCompletionNotifier, RemoteBuildRuleCompletionWaiter, AutoCloseable

    public class RemoteBuildRuleSynchronizer
extends Object
implements RemoteBuildRuleCompletionWaiter, RemoteBuildRuleCompletionNotifier, AutoCloseable
    Used by distributed build client to synchronize the local build and remote build state, which ensures that rules have finished building remotely before the local build fetches them from the cache.

    • Method Detail

      • waitForBuildRuleToAppearInCache

        public com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<CacheResult> waitForBuildRuleToAppearInCache(BuildRule buildRule,
                                                                                                       Supplier<com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<CacheResult>> cacheCheck)
        Description copied from interface: RemoteBuildRuleCompletionWaiter
        When performing a remote/distributed build, Future will get set once the given build target has finished building remotely and the cacheCheck no longer returns a miss (tested with a limited number of backoffs). For a non-remote build build, this operation is a no-op and the Future will return immediately.
        Specified by:
        waitForBuildRuleToAppearInCache in interface RemoteBuildRuleCompletionWaiter
        Returns:
        Future with result supplied by final cacheCheck (further chaining with direct executor will use the thread that finished the execution of cacheCheck) or future with CacheResult.ignored() if the operation is a no-op.

      • waitForMostBuildRulesToFinishRemotely

        public com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<Boolean> waitForMostBuildRulesToFinishRemotely()
        Specified by:
        waitForMostBuildRulesToFinishRemotely in interface RemoteBuildRuleCompletionWaiter
        Returns:
        Future that will complete when most build rules have finished remotely. Value indicates whether most rules finished successfully or in a failure.

      • signalCompletionOfBuildRule

        public void signalCompletionOfBuildRule(String buildTarget)
        Description copied from interface: RemoteBuildRuleCompletionNotifier
        Signals that an individual build rule has completed remotely
        Specified by:
        signalCompletionOfBuildRule in interface RemoteBuildRuleCompletionNotifier

      • signalUnlockedBuildRule

        public void signalUnlockedBuildRule(String buildTarget)
        Description copied from interface: RemoteBuildRuleCompletionNotifier
        Signals that for an individual build rule there is no need to wait further for remote build to put it in cache - if it is not in cache now, it will not be later.
        Specified by:
        signalUnlockedBuildRule in interface RemoteBuildRuleCompletionNotifier

      • signalStartedRemoteBuildingOfBuildRule

        public void signalStartedRemoteBuildingOfBuildRule(String buildTarget)
        Description copied from interface: RemoteBuildRuleCompletionNotifier
        Signals that an individual build rule has started building remotely
        Specified by:
        signalStartedRemoteBuildingOfBuildRule in interface RemoteBuildRuleCompletionNotifier

      • shouldWaitForRemoteCompletionOfBuildRule

        public boolean shouldWaitForRemoteCompletionOfBuildRule(String buildTarget)
        Description copied from interface: RemoteBuildRuleCompletionWaiter
        Local Buck builds will never wait for remote completion of rule before building locally. Stampede builds always wait if local_mode = WAIT_FOR_REMOTE, and will also wait if set to false but the build rule has already started building remotely.
        Specified by:
        shouldWaitForRemoteCompletionOfBuildRule in interface RemoteBuildRuleCompletionWaiter
        Returns:

      • signalCompletionOfRemoteBuild

        public void signalCompletionOfRemoteBuild(boolean success)
        When the remote build has finished (or failed), all rules should be marked as completed. If it failed, we also do not want to do any more backoffs for rules waiting for cache sync.
        Specified by:
        signalCompletionOfRemoteBuild in interface RemoteBuildRuleCompletionNotifier
        Parameters:
        success - Indicates whether remote build finished successfully or in a failure.

      • signalMostBuildRulesFinished

        public void signalMostBuildRulesFinished(boolean success)
        Description copied from interface: RemoteBuildRuleCompletionNotifier
        Configured threshold percentage of build rules has finished building remotely.
        Specified by:
        signalMostBuildRulesFinished in interface RemoteBuildRuleCompletionNotifier
        Parameters:
        success - Indicates whether most rules finished successfully or in a failure.
